## Very Basic Markdown Tags

```{}
# Heading

## Sub-heading

### Another deeper heading
 
Paragraphs are separated by a blank line.

Text attributes *italic*, **bold**, `monospace`.

A [link](http://example.com).

Bullet list:
- apples  
- oranges  
- pears  

Numbered list:
1. apples
2. oranges
3. pears

Footnote:

- Method 1
now is the time.[^random_id]
[random_id]: citation and/or link text here

- Method 2 
(possibly only works in R Markdown)
now is the time.^[citation and/or link text here]



```
